article_title: No Capitalists To Absorb The Losses

article_metadata.author: Tim Worstall

og.description: As part of Obamacare, the ACA, there were some 23 health care cooperatives set up around the country. It's a lovely idea: why should there be profit guzzling capitalist plutocrats increasing the cost of peoples' vital and necessary health care? And it's also true that there's many very successful cooperatives [...]
